page.title: 15RECREATION Pentney & Narboro
page.content:
{Narborough}has a Village Hall which houses the{Social Club}with about 300 members. Activities include Playschool Mothers and Toddlers, Guides, Brownies Youth Club, Over 60's, Bingo and Whist Drives. Narborough has a{Concert Party who perform for charity. The Social Club has darts, dominoes, crib, pool, snooker and billiard teams. There is a juke box but live music each Saturday.
{Pentney}also has a Village Hall which is the hub of the village.The W.I. holds its meetings there every month. Whist Drives, Dances, Private Parties, Jumble Sales and Bazaars are held regularly. Pentney Inn has an Indoor Bowls Club with a snooker room. Discos and dances are also held there. Medieval evenings are held at Pentney Abbey.
